TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WorkflowIdentityFilter extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定工作流标识筛选器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类支持的版本控制和 Windows Workflow Foundation 的动态更新功能。This class supports the versioning and dynamic update functionality of Windows Workflow Foundation. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 工作流版本控制、 工作流标识和动态更新，请参阅以下主题。 workflow versioning, workflow identity, and dynamic update, see the following topics. [工作流版本控制Workflow Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=271561) 描述工作流版本控制功能在中引入的[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]。Describes the workflow versioning functionality introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. [动态更新Dynamic Update](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271563) 描述如何通过使用动态更新来更新持久化工作流实例的工作流定义。Describes how to update the workflow definition of a persisted workflow instance by using dynamic update. [使用 WorkflowApplication 标识和版本控制Using WorkflowApplication Identity and Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271564) 介绍如何使用 并行承载工作流的多个版本。Describes how to use to host multiple versions of a workflow side-by-side. [WorkflowServiceHost 中的并行版本控制Side by Side Versioning in WorkflowServiceHost](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271565) 介绍如何托管的单个终结点上的工作流的多个版本。Describes how to host multiple versions of a workflow on a single endpoint. [如何：并行托管多个版本的工作流How to: Host Multiple Versions of a Workflow Side-by-Side](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271566) 此步骤[入门教程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570)演示更新工作流定义，以及承载在同一时间使用旧的和新定义的工作流。This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating a workflow definition, and hosting workflows using both the old and new definition at the same time. [如何：更新正在运行的工作流实例的定义How to: Update the Definition of a Running Workflow Instance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271567) 此步骤[入门教程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570)演示了更新持久化工作流实例，以使用新的工作流定义。This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating persisted workflow instances to use a new workflow definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.WorkflowIdentityFilter Any = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定任何工作流标识筛选器。

summary.span: 指定任何工作流标识筛选器修订。

span.span: Specifies any revision of workflow identity filter.
